Constructor Detail

Appt

public Appt()
Default constructor Constructs an invalid appointment

Appt

public Appt(int startHour,
            int startMinute,
            int startDay,
            int startMonth,
            int startYear,
            int duration,
            String title,
            String description,
            String location,
            int alarmTime,
            String emailAddress,
            String webAddress)
Constructs a new appointment that starts at a specific time on the date specified. The appointment is constructed with no recurrence information by default. To set recurrence information, construct the appointment and then call setRecurrence(...) method. The XmlElement will be set when the appointment is saved to disk.
Parameters:
startHour - The hour that the appointment starts on. The hours are numbered 0-23 to represent 12a.m. to 11pm on the day specified.
startMinute - The minute of the hour the appointment starts on.
startDay - The day of the month the appointment starts on.
startMonth - The month of the year the appointment starts on. Use the constants provided by Gregorian Calendar to set the month.
startYear - The year the appointment starts on.
duration - The duration of the appointment (in minutes)
title - The title or caption to give the appointment
description - The appointment's details
location - Where the appointment occurs
alarmTime - Number of minutes before the start time to show reminder
emailAddress - An e-mail address associated with the appointment
webAddress - A web address associated with the appointment

Appt

public Appt(int startDay,
            int startMonth,
            int startYear,
            String title,
            String description,
            String location,
            String emailAddress,
            String webAddress)
Constructs a new appointment that has no start time on the date specified. The appointment is constructed with no recurrence information by default. To set recurrence information, construct the appointment and then call setRecurrence(...) method. The XmlElement will be set when the appointment is saved to disk.
Parameters:
startDay - The day of the month the appointment starts on
startMonth - The month of the year the appointment starts on. Use the constants provided by Gregorian Calendar to set the month.
startYear - The year the appointment starts on.
title - The title or caption to give the appointment
description - The appointment's details
location - Where the appointment occurs
emailAddress - An e-mail address associated with the appointment
webAddress - A web address associated with the appointment

isOn

public boolean isOn(int day,
                    int month,
                    int year)
Deprecated.  

Checks to see if an appointment occurs on a certain day, month, year. Takes recurrence into account.
Returns:
True if the appointment occurs on a certain day/month/year

isRecurring

public boolean isRecurring()
Checks to see if an appointment recurrs or not
Returns:
True if the appointment does occur more than once

hasTimeSet

public boolean hasTimeSet()
Checks to see if a time is set for this appointment.
Returns:
True if this appointment has a time set. Otherwise false.

Returns:
True if the appointment is valid
